title: [Bug]: full path is needed for the --user-data-dir
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

The docs says relative path, but you need a full path

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

2.0.7

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
From https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/issues/1632#issuecomment-2791593663
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
For the docs to indicate the full path is needed.
```

### Debug

```markdown
No debug needed, this is mostly a docs issue.
```

### Additional context

_No response_
